definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with

sentences.english: You wanna die by Post-its? Because I could make that happen.
sentences.chinese: 你想被便利貼弄死嗎？因爲我可以做到。

sentences.english: Since women cannot perform the duties of ancestor worship, girl children are often murdered by their parents.
sentences.chinese: 女人不能履行祭祖的職責，所以女嬰常常被父母弄死。

sentences.english: As he crumples the flowering end of the weed in his hand, Nelson grimaces.
sentences.chinese: 尼爾森苦笑着掐斷手中雜草的花，把雜草弄死。

sentences.english: “I tried bending my neck against the wall to kill myself, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “我想撞牆折頸弄死自己，”他說道。

sentences.english: The duke treated the bird as a distinguished guest. In consequence, he tortured the bird to death.
sentences.chinese: 魯君以上賓的待遇養鳥，結果把鳥兒給弄死了。

sentences.english: In one word, they would excute me.
sentences.chinese: 一句話來說，他們會弄死我。

sentences.english: Now will he kill off The Lizard?
sentences.chinese: 現在，他要弄死蜥蜴人嗎？

sentences.english: Teenager killed by his own chair.
sentences.chinese: 一個小年輕被他自己的椅子弄死了。

sentences.english: One day, she decided to do away with him. She added poison to the chapatti she prepared for him!
sentences.chinese: 一天，她決定弄死他，就在爲他準備的薄餅上下了毒。

definition: to hack to death/to kill with an ax
to infuriate/to be furious/to die from an excess of anger
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
to slaughter livestock/to govern or rule/to cheat customers/imperial official in dynastic China
to beat up/to break to pieces
to kill sb to prevent them from divulging a secret/to silence sb
